column4: does anyone know how can i enable powersaving on my wireless adapter using ath5k?
I've never heard of powersaving a wifi NIC
i guess i meant wifi "power management" it can be done under windows, but i haven't fund out how to do it in ubuntu with ath5k
There may be a patch for ath5k - https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/kernel-team/2009-April/005665.html
